job_history.work_description: Meet with major airlines domestically and internationally to secure future business contracts. Reserve travel including airline and hotel accommodations for my department. Utilize company leads to expand current customer base and follow up on all leads promptly via phone, email and customer visits.

Develop maximum sales potential out of major airline customers with excellent customer service techniques and knowledge of products and services, as well as competition's strengths and weaknesses. Build and maintain quality relations with customers to increase the volume of sales on a consistent basis through ongoing determination of customer needs.

Processed customer quotes and verified accurate customer and product information. Managed submitted requests for quotes and initiated the quoting process to cultivate new business. Manage and expedite customer orders to ensure customer satisfaction.

Demonstrated capacity to provide support for executive-level staff; managed all essential tasks, coordinated travel and marketing-support activities. Oversee receptionist area, including greeting visitors and responding to telephone and in-person requests for information.

Managed a crew of five flight attendants; performing all necessary flight attendant duties pertaining to in-flight safety and customer service. Verify that first aid kits and other emergency equipment, including fire extinguishers and oxygen bottles, are in working order within FAA limits.

skills.name: Customer Service
skills.explanation: Over a decade of experience in customer-facing roles, including customer support and flight attendant positions, demonstrating expert-level mastery of customer service skills.

skills.name: Sales and Business Development
skills.explanation: Consistently utilized sales techniques to increase customer base and expand business, showing strong proficiency in sales and business development.

skills.name: Leadership and Management
skills.explanation: Managed teams of varying sizes, including a crew of five flight attendants and customer support teams, indicating strong leadership and management skills.

skills.name: Communication and Interpersonal Skills
skills.explanation: Effectively communicated with customers, colleagues, and executive-level staff through various channels, including phone, email, and in-person interactions, demonstrating expert-level mastery of communication and interpersonal skills.

skills.name: Time Management and Organization
skills.explanation: Coordinated travel, managed customer orders, and prioritized tasks to ensure customer satisfaction, showing strong proficiency in time management and organization.

skills.name: Problem-Solving and Adaptability
skills.explanation: Handled customer requests, managed emergency situations, and adapted to changing circumstances, indicating strong problem-solving and adaptability skills.
